original_title: Afghanistan win the toss, opt to field first; debuts for Pathirana and Hemantha
original_body_lines: Afghanistan won the toss and elected to field first in the first ODI against Sri Lanka in Hambantota.
Matheesha Pathirana and Dushan Hemantha have been handed debuts, while Test captain Dimuth Karunaratne makes a comeback, playing his first ODI in two years.
